item.title: Setting up machine learning libraries with GPU
item.description: Switch between gcc8 and gcc9 For tensorflow and pytorch, you need gcc8 to compile code which is not the system default. Do the following to use gcc8: sudo apt -y install build-essential sudo apt -y install gcc-8 g++-8 gcc-9 g++-9 sudo update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/gcc gcc /usr/bin/gcc-8 8 --slave /usr/bin/g++ g++ /usr/bin/g++-8 sudo update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/gcc gcc /usr/bin/gcc-9 9 --slave /usr/bin/g++ g++ /usr/bin/g++-9 # Every time you want to make a selection, run: sudo update-alternatives --config gcc # press number corresponding to your choice
